DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare two FET protocol modify substitute FET cycle order maintain high ongoing positive pregnancy rate thus reduce early pregnancy loss . Hypothesis : add GnRH-agonist substituted cycle FET treatment reduces early pregnancy loss .
DOC.brief_title: Substituted Frozen Embryo Transfer Cycles With GnRH-agonist Supplementation
